availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bernard H. Pryor (McCracken County, KY, merchant)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, merchant. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Married to Laura Cole Pryor in McCracken County, Kentucky, on September 26, 1858. Father of R. H. Pryor. Resident of Trigg County in 1850. Merchant in McCracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 290A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 971.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994046, McCracken County Marriages, p. 11.
"Bernard H Pryor (1823-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial 112830587, accessed January 19, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112830587.
